title: Rav Yigal Cohen's Call to Action
body: Rav Yigal Cohen urges bnei hayeshivos and avreichim to attend a mass atzeres tefillah in Yerushalayim, citing a call to leave their comfort zone and show love for those in need.

title: Rabbi Kass Dies at 97
body: Rabbi Alvin Kass, NYPD Chief Chaplain for 59 years, has passed away at 97. He joined the force in 1966 and was remembered for his compassion and faith.
